hospital.name: Even Hospital Bangalore
hospital.location: 29/2, Race Course Rd, Madhava Nagar, Gandhi Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001
hospital.philosophy: Preventive, people-first approach to care. Doctors are evaluated by results, not procedure count. Care is collaborative with continuous follow-up and post-discharge support.

specialties_and_conditions.description: Surgical treatment of conditions affecting the abdomen, digestive system, and general surgical emergencies

patient_phrases: I have sudden pain in my belly
My stomach feels tender and swollen

qa_pairs.question: I have severe abdominal pain, who should I see?
qa_pairs.answer: For acute abdominal pain, consult our General Surgeons. Dr. K N Srikanth has 33+ years and is a renowned laparoscopic surgeon. Dr. Sunil Kumar V brings 20+ years of expertise. Dr. Venkateshu Devendran specializes in emergency surgical cases with 100% patient recommendation.

patient_phrases: I have pain under my right rib cage
I feel pain after eating fatty foods

qa_pairs.question: I think I have gallstones, who treats this?
qa_pairs.answer: Gallstone treatment is handled by our General Surgeons. Dr. Poornima Parasuraman specializes in laparoscopic cholecystectomy with 11+ years. Dr. K N Srikanth, with 33+ years as a leading laparoscopic surgeon, is excellent for complex cases.

patient_phrases: I have pain in my lower right abdomen
I have pain near my belly button
I have a bulge in my groin
I feel a lump in my abdomen
I have a hernia that needs fixing
I have bleeding during bowel movements
I have itching in my anal area
I have pain while passing stool
I have internal or external piles

qa_pairs.question: I have bleeding piles, who is the best doctor?
qa_pairs.answer: Dr. Prateek Patil is our proctology specialist with 17+ years and 96% recommendation rating. He specializes in laser surgery for piles with minimal pain, no stitches, 1-2 days recovery, and same-day discharge.

patient_phrases: I have severe pain during bowel movements
I have a tear in my anal canal
I have continuous pain in anal area
I have blood in my stool
I have polyps that need removal
I have familial history of colon cancer
I have lower abdomen pain and fever
I was diagnosed with thyroid cancer

specialties_and_conditions.description: Treatment of bone, joint, and musculoskeletal disorders including arthritis, fractures, and sports injuries

patient_phrases: My knee is painful and swollen
My hip hurts when I walk
My joints feel stiff and painful

qa_pairs.question: I have severe knee pain, who should I see?
qa_pairs.answer: For joint pain, consult our orthopedic specialists. Dr. Harish Puranik has 17+ years with international training in joint replacement and arthroscopy. Dr. Prashanth Nagaraj brings 20+ years with international MRCS qualification. Both excel in joint pain diagnosis and treatment.

patient_phrases: I have arthritis and need pain relief
I have rheumatoid arthritis affecting my joints
I fell and think I have a fracture

qa_pairs.question: I have a sports injury, how is it treated?
qa_pairs.answer: Dr. Harish Puranik specializes in sports medicine with 17+ years and international training. He diagnoses ligament tears and sports injuries using physical examination and imaging. Treatment ranges from conservative rehabilitation to arthroscopic surgery for return to athletic function.

patient_phrases: I have neck pain and stiffness
I have spinal pain with numbness

qa_pairs.question: I have chronic back pain, what should I do?
qa_pairs.answer: For spinal concerns, Dr. Vikas Chavan specializes in spine surgery with advanced training in minimally invasive techniques. He has 8+ years with Fellowship in Spine Surgery. Expert in both conservative and surgical spine disorder management.

specialties_and_conditions.description: Comprehensive healthcare for infants, children, and adolescents including neonatal care and pediatric emergencies

patient_phrases: My child needs regular health checkup
I need immunization for my baby
I'm concerned about my child's growth

qa_pairs.question: I need comprehensive care for my child, who should I consult?
qa_pairs.answer: Dr. Sharil Hegde P brings 24+ years of pediatric expertise with 99% recommendation rating. Dr. Nishita Das has 10+ years with international MRCPCH qualification. Both provide comprehensive child health, immunization, and development monitoring.

patient_phrases: I just had a baby and need follow-up

specialties_and_conditions.description: Comprehensive reproductive healthcare for women including pregnancy, childbirth, fertility, and gynecological conditions

patient_phrases: I'm pregnant and need prenatal care

qa_pairs.question: I'm pregnant, who should I consult for prenatal care?
qa_pairs.answer: Dr. Rashmi Nagaraja Naik brings 22+ years with 97% recommendation rating and expertise in high-risk pregnancies. She has international training and advanced minimal access surgery skills. Dr. Nivedita Jha offers 14+ years of comprehensive prenatal care. Both provide complete pregnancy monitoring and delivery management.

patient_phrases: I'm due soon and need delivery arrangements
I need obstetric care for delivery
I'm planning vaginal or cesarean delivery
I want to discuss fertility options

qa_pairs.question: I've been unable to conceive, who can help?
qa_pairs.answer: Dr. Rashmi Nagaraja Naik specializes in reproductive medicine and infertility management with 22+ years. She has comprehensive expertise in fertility evaluation and treatment options with holistic approach.

specialties_and_conditions.description: Diagnosis and medical management of heart and cardiovascular diseases

patient_phrases: I'm concerned about my heart health

qa_pairs.question: I have chest pain and need cardiac evaluation, who should I see?
qa_pairs.answer: Dr. Basavaraj Utagi is our cardiologist with 17+ years training from AIIMS Delhi. He holds international fellowships (FSCAI, IFESC) and specializes in comprehensive cardiac assessment. Expert in heart disease diagnosis and management.

specialties_and_conditions.description: Treatment of disorders affecting the ear, nose, throat, and related structures

qa_pairs.question: I have ENT problems, who should I consult?
qa_pairs.answer: Dr. Animesh Banerjee is our ENT specialist with exceptional 35+ years of experience. One of Bangalore's most experienced ENT doctors with comprehensive knowledge across all ear, nose, and throat conditions.

specialties_and_conditions.description: Comprehensive medical care for adult patients with various health conditions

patient_phrases: I'm not feeling well but unsure why

qa_pairs.question: I need comprehensive health evaluation, who should I see?
qa_pairs.answer: Our internal medicine specialists offer comprehensive health assessment. Dr. Ankit P Bhojani brings 10+ years with excellent diagnostic skills. Dr. Sriharee Kulkarni has 17+ years. Dr. Binita Priyambada brings 22+ years of clinical expertise. All provide thorough health evaluation and preventive care.

specialties_and_conditions.description: Diagnosis and treatment of urological disorders affecting the urinary and reproductive systems

qa_pairs.question: I have urological problems, who should I consult?
qa_pairs.answer: Dr. Vishal Naik is our urologist with 14+ years of comprehensive urology expertise. Skilled in managing diverse urological conditions with patient-centric approach and advanced surgical techniques.

specialties_and_conditions.description: Professional nutrition guidance and therapeutic diet planning for health optimization

patient_phrases: I want to improve my nutrition
I need diet plan for weight management

qa_pairs.question: I need personalized nutrition guidance, who should I see?
qa_pairs.answer: Our registered dietitians provide expert nutrition counseling. Ms. Kamar Afshan M brings 7+ years with personalized diet planning expertise. Dr. Sonali Kulkarni has 20+ years of comprehensive clinical dietetics experience. Both provide therapeutic nutrition management.

specialties_and_conditions.description: Immediate medical care for acute medical emergencies and critical conditions

patient_phrases: I have acute symptoms requiring emergency evaluation

qa_pairs.question: I need emergency medical care, who is available?
qa_pairs.answer: Dr. Gautham Shankar Saseendran specializes in emergency medicine with 11+ years. Expert in rapid assessment and management of acute medical emergencies with multilingual communication skills.

specialties_and_conditions.description: Diagnosis and medical management of gastrointestinal and digestive system disorders

qa_pairs.question: I have digestive problems, who treats gastroenterology issues?
qa_pairs.answer: Dr. Puneeth B S is our medical gastroenterologist with 6+ years of specialization. Skilled in diagnosing and managing diverse gastrointestinal disorders with evidence-based approach.

specialties_and_conditions.description: Diagnosis and management of kidney and renal system disorders

qa_pairs.question: I have kidney problems, who should I see?
qa_pairs.answer: Our nephrologists specialize in kidney disease management. Dr. Naveen Kumar K L brings 4+ years of focused nephrology training. Dr. Girish Namagondlu Seetharamaiah is recently certified with current nephrology knowledge. Both provide comprehensive renal care and management.

specialties_and_conditions.description: Diagnosis and treatment of mental health disorders and psychological conditions

qa_pairs.question: I have mental health concerns, who should I consult?
qa_pairs.answer: Dr. Harshitha V Handral is our psychiatrist with 5+ years of specialization. Dedicated to comprehensive mental health support and evidence-based psychological treatment.

doctor_profiles.name: Dr. Poornima Parasuraman
doctor_profiles.education: Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences
doctor_profiles.why_recommend: 11+ years of expertise in minimally invasive procedures. Specializes in complex gallbladder, thyroid, and breast surgeries with focus on patient recovery and minimal scarring.

doctor_profiles.name: Dr. K N Srikanth
education: Royal College of Physicians and Surgeons Glasgow (1996)
doctor_profiles.why_recommend: Over 3 decades of specialized laparoscopic expertise. Recognized as one of nation's leading laparoscopic surgeons with extensive publications and international FRCS credentials.

doctor_profiles.name: Dr. V Shiva Kumar
doctor_profiles.why_recommend: 19+ years combining Indian surgical expertise with international standards. Trained at Bangalore Medical College and University of Illinois.

doctor_profiles.name: Dr. Sunil Kumar V
doctor_profiles.why_recommend: 20+ years of comprehensive surgical experience. Known for meticulous surgical technique and compassionate patient care.

doctor_profiles.why_recommend: 13+ years with 100% recommendation rating. Specializes in minimal access procedures with focus on patient comfort and rapid recovery.

doctor_profiles.why_recommend: 17+ years with 96% recommendation rating. Specialized proctology expertise with advanced laser surgery training.
